data.message: When they come up with a way to stop people from sending game requests PLEASE LET ME KNOW!  #MORETHANANNOYED

replies.message: Go to games & choose the option to ignore or stop all game requests.  Unfortunately you'd have to do it for each individual game. There's no mass block on games.

Hi Vanessa. When you block an app or game, it won't be able to access any of your Facebook information or send you any requests. If you no longer want an app or game to contact you, please remove it. To learn how to block an app or game, please visit our Help Center at: https://www.facebook.com/help/www/121070141307903. -Hailey
